bugs.cf_release_notes:
Feature: 
add option to clean yum cache on install/update/remove of rpm package
Reason: 
if cache is not cleared, new package is not visible in client cache
Result: 
after cache is cleared, the repository content is now in sync with what needs to be installed on consumer
bugs.summary: [RFE] Allow Pulp server to clean yum cache on consumer to take care of package rollback/update scenarios
